author: andschwa
body: To integrate Paul's work with the new DNX build system, the libhost we've written needs to be replaced with a shim that uses the shipped dnx.coreclr.so; fortunately since we have this as a library, this should be pretty easy. VSO create date - 12/2/2015 9:53:00
title: Update libhost to use dnx.coreclr.so
